name: ParadisePi
description: Raspberry Pi based sACN lighting/OSC sound facility control panel

scripts.package-win: electron-packager . cueb --overwrite --asar=true --platform=win32 --arch=x64 --icon=assets/icon/scaled/icon.ico --prune=true --out=release-builds --version-string.CompanyName=JBithell --version-string.FileDescription=CueB Show Control --version-string.ProductName="CueB Controller Software"
